translation.en: You and I, we're the last of the Mo-Freakins. And to top it off, Tiny's back.
translation.ja: 時代は変わったんだ それとタイニーが戻った

translation.en: -Mr. Tiny? Back from the other side? -Yes!
translation.ja: ミスター･タイニーが あちら側から？ 先週 議会の資料室で 「魂の本」をいじってた

translation.en: Just last week, he was at the Council Library, messing with the Book of Souls.
translation.ja: 先週 議会の資料室で 「魂の本」をいじってた

translation.en: He's trying to destroy us all, that megalomaniac! That man's a megalomaniac!
translation.ja: 俺たちを全滅させる気だ やつはイカれてる！

translation.en: And those murderous, scumbag Vampaneze.
translation.ja: それから残忍で浅ましい バンパニーズども

translation.en: They're up to something too, and it's all connected. It's all connected. I can feel it!
translation.ja: 連中も何か企んでるぞ タイニーと関係がある

translation.en: Come with me. We can avenge old Vincent.
translation.ja: 一緒に来い ビンセントの復讐だ バンパニーズを殺す

translation.en: Kill us some Vampaneze! No.
translation.ja: ビンセントの復讐だ バンパニーズを殺す

translation.en: I'm sorry. No? Why?
translation.ja: やめとくよ やめとく？ なぜだ？

translation.en: I'm done fighting. I left that life for a reason.
translation.ja: わけありで もう戦わない

translation.en: I'm just a vaudevillian. It's a simple life, and I like it.
translation.ja: 芸人の生活が気に入ってる

translation.en: Steve. [ Steve ] I know who you are.
translation.ja: スティーブ あんたの正体を知ってる バー･ホーストンだ

translation.en: I know what you are, Vur Horsten.
translation.ja: あんたの正体を知ってる バー･ホーストンだ

translation.en: [ Gasps ] Who sent you? The Apocalypse Monger?
translation.ja: 誰の使いだ？ 死の商人か 血の男爵か？

translation.en: The Blood Barons? [ Steve ] No... No one. I... No one sent me.
translation.ja: 誰の使いだ？ 死の商人か 血の男爵か？ いいや 別に誰も…

translation.en: I have these vampire books, and I saw a painting of him with some girl in, like, 1819.
translation.ja: バンパイアの本で 女の人と一緒の絵を見た

translation.en: It said that she broke up with him when she found he was a vampire.
translation.ja: 正体がバレて 彼女に捨てられたと…

translation.en: [ Chuckling ] Did you hear that, Gavner?
translation.ja: 聞いたか

translation.en: Missy broke up with me because I was a vampire.
translation.ja: バンパイアだから 捨てられた？

translation.en: Funny. I always thought it was the only thing she liked about me.
translation.ja: バンパイアだから 愛されたのさ

translation.en: Let the kid go. Let him go.
translation.ja: その子を放せ

translation.en: Now, are you mentally unfit? Didn't you hear me threaten you at the show?
translation.ja: お前は正気じゃない ショーのとき警告しただろ

translation.en: I did. It was awesome.
translation.ja: ああ 感激したよ

translation.en: You see, I want this. I want you to make me into a vampire.
translation.ja: 俺は心から望んでる バンパイアにしてくれ

translation.en: I mean, vampires, they... they don't take crap from anybody.
translation.ja: バンパイアは見下されず

translation.en: They live by their own set of rules.
translation.ja: 掟(おきて)に従って生きる

translation.en: It's true. They do have their own rules.
translation.ja: そうだ 我々は掟を作った

translation.en: We wrote some of them. Yes, and one of them is children can't become vampires.
translation.ja: そうだ 我々は掟を作った その１つ “子供は バンパイアになれない”

translation.en: Look, look. Blood.
translation.ja: ほら 血だぞ

translation.en: [ Gasps ] Blood!
translation.ja: 血だ

translation.en: You see, Gavner? Blood.
translation.ja: 見ろ ガブナー 血だ

translation.en: Look. If you become a vampire,
translation.ja: バンパイアになったら―

translation.en: you have to leave your friends and your family.
translation.ja: 友達や家族を捨てるんだ

translation.en: It's deeply depressing. Trust me.
translation.ja: どんなに寂しいか つらいぞ

translation.en: Now get out of here.
translation.ja: もう出て行け

translation.en: I haven't seen my dad in years.
translation.ja: 親父に捨てられ―

translation.en: My mom is drunk all the time.
translation.ja: お袋は酒びたり

translation.en: I absolutely hate my life.
translation.ja: 最低の人生さ

translation.en: I never actually said it before, but it's the truth.
translation.ja: 誰にも言ってないが本当だ

translation.en: This... is what I was meant for.
translation.ja: 俺はバンパイアになる運命だ

translation.en: What you're meant for?
translation.ja: 運命だと？

translation.en: Well, if that's the case, let's test your blood.
translation.ja: では血を味見する

translation.en: N-No. No!
translation.ja: よせ やめろ

translation.en: Who sent you here? Your blood tastes of evil.
translation.ja: 誰の手先だ？ 邪悪の味がするぞ

translation.en: You can never be a vampire.
translation.ja: あきらめろ

translation.en: [ Steve ] What? I-I have what, bad blood?
translation.ja: 何だって？ 俺の血が邪悪だと？

translation.en: I'm never gonna forget this.
translation.ja: 今に見てやがれ

translation.en: One day, I promise you. I will hunt you down--
translation.ja: いつか お前を仕留める

translation.en: And what?
translation.ja: 我が輩を―

translation.en: Kill me?
translation.ja: 殺すのか？

translation.en: Do you know how easily I could kill you?
translation.ja: お前なんざ 今夜にでも始末できるんだ

translation.en: I could do it tonight. I could knock you out...
translation.ja: お前なんざ 今夜にでも始末できるんだ 殴って気絶させ バスに ひかせればいい

translation.en: and lay you in front of a bus, and no one would ever know!
translation.ja: 殴って気絶させ バスに ひかせればいい

translation.en: Calm down. Save that stuff for the enemy.
translation.ja: 本気で相手にするな ただのクソガキだ

translation.en: He's just an idiot kid, who should be leaving...
translation.ja: 本気で相手にするな ただのクソガキだ さっさと出て行くんだ

translation.en: right now...
translation.ja: さっさと出て行くんだ

translation.en: while he still can. [ Door Slams Shut ]
translation.ja: 命のあるうちに

translation.en: You're out there, man.
translation.ja: どうした？

translation.en: All right. One for the road.
translation.ja: それでは別れの１杯だ

translation.en: I'm headed back to the mountain...
translation.ja: “マウンテン”に戻り―

translation.en: to try to convince those old cowards to stand up against the Vampaneze.
translation.ja: バンパニーズと戦うよう 腰抜けどもを説得する

translation.en: Gavner, if we kill one of them, it means war.
translation.ja: やつらを１人でも殺せば 全面戦争になるぞ

translation.en: Wouldn't that be a shame?
translation.ja: いいじゃないか

translation.en: Poor old Vincent.
translation.ja: 哀れなビンセント

translation.en: You've been awfully quiet under there.
translation.ja: オクタ 静かだな

translation.en: Get in.
translation.ja: 乗れ

translation.en: Thanks. Thanks. I, uh... I really needed a ride. [ Chuckles ]
translation.ja: どうもすみません 助かりました

translation.en: Oh, absolutely. Absolutely. Delighted. [ Man Groans ]
translation.ja: よかったな 私もうれしいぞ

translation.en: Are you the one known as Steve?
translation.ja: 君がスティーブなのか？

translation.en: No. I, uh... I'm the one known as Darren.
translation.ja: 違います 僕の名前はダレン

translation.en: I, uh... I-I actually had a bike.
translation.ja: 自転車を忘れた

translation.en: But I'll-I'll just get it tomorrow...
translation.ja: 明日の昼間 取りに行かなきゃ

translation.en: in the daylight. No need.
translation.ja: 明日の昼間 取りに行かなきゃ 車のトランクに入っとる

translation.en: It's in the trunk.
translation.ja: 車のトランクに入っとる

translation.en: Now, if I may ask, Darren,
translation.ja: ひとつ聞いていいかな ダレン君

translation.en: do you believe in the immutability of the human soul?
translation.ja: 人間の魂の不変性を 信じておるかね？

translation.en: The what? [ Man Groans ]
translation.ja: 何を？ こいつは魂など知りません

translation.en: He knows nothing of souls, does he?
translation.ja: こいつは魂など知りません

translation.en: Knows only of blood, huh?
translation.ja: 血に飢えてるだけ

translation.en: The pulsing, delicious, the ruby red. [ Device Whirring ]
translation.ja: ドクドクと脈打つ うまそうなルビー色の血

translation.en: Uh... Wow. Wow. You know what? You can just let me off right here.
translation.ja: もう大丈夫 ここで降ろして下さい

translation.en: What's the rush? After all,
translation.ja: あわてるな 恐ろしいバンパイアから 君を救ってやっただろ

translation.en: didn't we save you from the scary, scary vampire?
translation.ja: 恐ろしいバンパイアから 君を救ってやっただろ

translation.en: Doesn't act like leadership material.
translation.ja: 指導者というより

translation.en: Acts more like a bag of blood. Are you? Huh?
translation.ja: このガキは 血の詰まった袋ですぜ

translation.en: Bag of blood? Shows how much you know, Murlaugh.
translation.ja: そうだろ？ 分からんのか マーロック この子は大物になるぞ

translation.en: I think he reeks of potential.
translation.ja: 分からんのか マーロック この子は大物になるぞ

translation.en: Ow! Sorry.
translation.ja: すまんな

translation.en: Souvenir.
translation.ja: 記念品だ

translation.en: We all have a destiny, Darren.
translation.ja: 誰にでも運命がある

translation.en: With a few simple tests, we can find out what yours is.
translation.ja: 簡単なテストで 君の運命を探ろう

translation.en: Wonderful to meet you, Darren.
translation.ja: 会えてよかったよ

translation.en: Oh, it's like looking in a mirror.
translation.ja: 我々は似た者同士だ

translation.en: Darren!
translation.ja: ダレン

translation.en: We'll be in touch. [ Fingers Snap ]
translation.ja: また会おう

translation.en: Hey. Hey. [ Octa Squeaking ] I'm gonna try to get you some food, okay? Just hold on one sec.
translation.ja: 食べ物を捕ってくる ちょっと待ってろ

translation.en: -I'm gonna go get some flies from the windowsill, okay? -Hey.
translation.ja: 窓の所にハエが…

translation.en: Why are you acting so weird?
translation.ja: 何してんだ？

translation.en: [ Scoffs ] I'm-I'm not acting weird.
translation.ja: 別に 何も

translation.en: You were just talking to your backpack. Yeah. What? No, I wasn't.
translation.ja: バッグに話を

translation.en: Darren, yes, you were. I wasn't.
translation.ja: 話してた

translation.en: Let-Let... Just let me see. See? It's just my backpack.
translation.ja: 見せろよ

translation.en: Seriously, stop it. Just... Let me just see.
translation.ja: 隠すな 見せろってば

translation.en: Holy shit! That's... That's the-the-- Yeah.
translation.ja: ウソだろ！ これは…

translation.en: I went back to the theater after the show, and I kind of borrowed it.
translation.ja: ちょっと借りたんだ

translation.en: You stole from a vampire? Do you realize you're a dead man?
translation.ja: バンパイアのクモだ 殺されるぞ！

translation.en: Shh! He's never gonna find me. You're a dead man.
translation.ja: バンパイアのクモだ 殺されるぞ！ 見つからないさ

translation.en: Okay? Just... [ Chuckles ]
translation.ja: 見つからないさ

translation.en: Wait a second. When...
translation.ja: 待てよ いつ やつの部屋に行った？

translation.en: When did you go to Vur Horsten's room, and... what did you see?
translation.ja: 待てよ いつ やつの部屋に行った？ そこで何を見た？

translation.en: All right, I saw everything. Steve, are you crazy?
translation.ja: すべて見たよ バンパイアになるって 正気か？

translation.en: Why would you want to become a vampire?
translation.ja: バンパイアになるって 正気か？

translation.en: Listen, you can't understand.
translation.ja: 分かりっこねえ お前は恵まれてる

translation.en: You have everything. What do I have?
translation.ja: 分かりっこねえ お前は恵まれてる 俺にあるのは “秘密の親友”だけ？

translation.en: A secret best friend?
translation.ja: 俺にあるのは “秘密の親友”だけ？

translation.en: Hey. Leave it in there, okay? I gotta see it.
translation.ja: 外に出すな

translation.en: It's fine. I wanna see it.
translation.ja: 外に出すな 見たい

translation.en: Be careful, okay? Be really... careful.
translation.ja: 注意しろよ 気をつけてくれ

translation.en: This thing's even more hideous close up.
translation.ja: すげえゾッとする

translation.en: [ Squeaking ] Can you just put it back now, please?
translation.ja: バッグに戻せ

translation.en: Okay. I need the pipe.
translation.ja: 笛を吹けば

translation.en: [ Screaming, Gasping ] Oh, my gosh! What is that?
translation.ja: クモよ！

translation.en: Move! Steve, wait!
translation.ja: やめろ！

translation.en: [ Steve ] Move! Get out of the way, idiot!
translation.ja: みんな どけ！

translation.en: -Hey! Steve, no! -[ Grunts ]
translation.ja: スティーブ よせ！

translation.en: [ Students Screaming ] Now I got ya! Hold still! [ Grunts ]
translation.ja: よし そこを動くな！

translation.en: What's the matter with you? Whose side are you on?
translation.ja: なぜ止める？ 毒グモだ

translation.en: So what have you come to steal from me this time? [ Gasps ]
translation.ja: 今度は何を盗みに来た？ 泥棒め

translation.en: Thief! Nothing. Nothing.
translation.ja: 今度は何を盗みに来た？ 泥棒め 何も盗まないよ

translation.en: Look, uh, Octa bit my best friend Steve,
translation.ja: 親友のスティーブを オクタが刺した

translation.en: and, uh, he's in the hospital in a coma because of me.
translation.ja: 親友のスティーブを オクタが刺した 僕のせいで死にかけてる

translation.en: And, uh, I was wondering if you had an antidote.
translation.ja: 解毒剤を持ってない？

translation.en: I do.
translation.ja: あるぞ

translation.en: Thank you. But I only have a couple doses left.
translation.ja: よかった だが ほんの少量だ

translation.en: Why should I waste any on some little psychopath?
translation.ja: あのバカに使いたくない

translation.en: Please, I'm begging you, okay?
translation.ja: 頼む お願いだよ

translation.en: Look, I'm really sorry I stole Octa. I...
translation.ja: オクタのことは謝る

translation.en: I don't know what came over me. I-I... I never steal things.
translation.ja: 今まで盗みなんか したことない

translation.en: Why not?
translation.ja: どうして？

translation.en: Because it's wrong.
translation.ja: 犯罪だ

translation.en: So then you've learned a valuable moral lesson. Yes, I have.
translation.ja: モラルは あるようだな ああ

translation.en: And you'll never do anything wrong again as long as you live.
translation.ja: 一生 悪いことはしない？

translation.en: No, I won't. You see?
translation.ja: もちろん お前は泥棒でウソつきだな

translation.en: Now you're a thief and a liar.
translation.ja: お前は泥棒でウソつきだな

translation.en: What did Mr. Tiny want?
translation.ja: タイニーの望みは？

translation.en: Mr. Tiny? The fat man in the limousine.
translation.ja: タイニー？ リムジンのデブだ

translation.en: I don't know. Something about, uh, souls and, uh... and destiny.
translation.ja: 彼は魂や運命のことを 知ってたよ

translation.en: And he knew where I lived.
translation.ja: 僕の家も

translation.en: Looks like you're in deep shit, my larcenous friend.
translation.ja: まずいことに なったようだな

translation.en: Mr. Tiny doesn't just take a random interest in people.
translation.ja: タイニーは気まぐれで 人を選ばん

translation.en: And the people he does take an interest in wind up dead... or worse.
translation.ja: 興味を持たれた者は 死ぬか それ以下に

translation.en: What's worse than dead?
translation.ja: それ以下って？

translation.en: Oh. Lots of things.
translation.ja: いろいろある

translation.en: All right. I'll do it. I'll make you a bargain.
translation.ja: よし 解毒剤をやろう お前と取り引きだ

translation.en: You'll become my assistant.
translation.ja: 手下になれ

translation.en: I'll turn you into a half vampire. You'll be able to go out in the daylight. Very useful for me.
translation.ja: 半バンパイアだったら 昼間でも役に立つ

translation.en: You'll do chores for me and guard my coffin on the road.
translation.ja: 雑用をこなし 棺桶を見張れ

translation.en: And in return, I'll try and keep Mr. Tiny away from you.
translation.ja: お返しに タイニーから守ってやる

translation.en: Oh, and I'll save your stupid friend Steve,
translation.ja: バカな友達も助けるぞ

translation.en: despite the fact that he threatened to kill me.
translation.ja: やつは我が輩を脅したが

translation.en: -You'll save Steve? -Why not?
translation.ja: 彼を助ける？ もちろん

translation.en: If I became a half vampire, would I have to kill people?
translation.ja: 半バンパイアになれば 僕は人を殺すの？

translation.en: Interested, huh?
translation.ja: 興味あるか？

translation.en: Vampires don't kill the people they feed on.
translation.ja: 我々は殺さんが バンパニーズは人を殺す

translation.en: Vampaneze do. Big source of controversy.
translation.ja: 我々は殺さんが バンパニーズは人を殺す それが原因で80年戦った 今は休戦中 いつまで続くか

translation.en: War for about 80 years, then a truce. Getting ugly again apparently.
translation.ja: それが原因で80年戦った 今は休戦中 いつまで続くか

translation.en: But time's wasting!
translation.ja: 早く決めろ

translation.en: Wanna become a vampire?
translation.ja: 仲間になるか？

translation.en: It's a lonely life, but there's lots of it.
translation.ja: 孤独な人生だが 長生きできるぞ

translation.en: I can't make that decision right now.
translation.ja: 即答できないよ

translation.en: Do you wanna go home and ask your mommy and daddy?
translation.ja: おうちでママに相談するか？

translation.en: Do they make all the decisions for good little boys like you?
translation.ja: 何でも親が決めるのか？

translation.en: No, they don't.
translation.ja: まさか

translation.en: Poor Steve doesn't have much time left.
translation.ja: スティーブには時間がない

translation.en: Fine. I'll do it.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: To save my friend, not for any other reason. So get the antidote.
translation.ja: 親友の命を救うためだ 解毒剤をよこせ

translation.en: Right here.
translation.ja: ここだ

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you so much. First things first.
translation.ja: ありがとう その前に お前の血を味見するぞ

translation.en: Let's test your blood.
translation.ja: その前に お前の血を味見するぞ

translation.en: What are you doing? I'm not gonna bite you in the jugular. I could kill you that way. Show me your hands.
translation.ja: 頸(けい)動脈をかんだら死ぬだろ 手を出せ

translation.en: You have good blood. This will work.
translation.ja: いい血だ 問題ない

translation.en: All right. Hold up your hands.
translation.ja: 両手を上げろ 血を交換するんだ

translation.en: We're going to exchange blood. That's creepy.
translation.ja: 両手を上げろ 血を交換するんだ 怖いな

translation.en: I know. But that's how it's done.
translation.ja: 昔からの方法さ

translation.en: This may hurt when it gets to your heart.
translation.ja: 血が心臓に届くと痛む

translation.en: I feel cold.
translation.ja: 寒気がする

translation.en: Lick your fingers.
translation.ja: 指をなめろ

translation.en: Whoa. Is that like vampire power? Do I have super-spit now?
translation.ja: バンパイアって ツバも特殊なの？

translation.en: Yes. You have super-spit. The rest will take a while.
translation.ja: ほかの力のことは あとで教える

translation.en: The rest of what? What will I be able to do?
translation.ja: コウモリとかにも 変身できる？

translation.en: Can I, like, turn into a bat and stuff? No. That's bullshit.
translation.ja: コウモリとかにも 変身できる？ 下らんことを言うな 背に乗れ “フリット”する

translation.en: Now, hop on my back. We're going to flit.
translation.ja: 下らんことを言うな 背に乗れ “フリット”する

translation.en: We're gonna what? Just shut up and hop on my back.
translation.ja: 今 何て？ 黙って 背に乗れ

translation.en: You held your breath, right?
translation.ja: 息を止めてたか？

translation.en: Did I not tell you to hold your breath?
translation.ja: 言わなかったかな？

translation.en: Oh. Sorry.
translation.ja: すまない

translation.en: Whoa. Hold on.
translation.ja: つかまれ

translation.en: Why didn't we just take the elevator? I get claustrophobic.
translation.ja: エレベータを使えば？ 閉所恐怖症でな だが棺桶は平気なんだ

translation.en: Strange, huh? Given where I sleep every night.
translation.ja: 閉所恐怖症でな だが棺桶は平気なんだ

translation.en: But somehow, when it's my own confined space, it's different.
translation.ja: 自分の場所だと落ち着く

translation.en: He looks horrible. Can you give him the antidote, please?
translation.ja: ひどい 早く解毒剤を

translation.en: She really didn't like him.
translation.ja: オクタに嫌われた

translation.en: Be careful.
translation.ja: そっと

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing?
translation.ja: 何してる？

translation.en: [ Vial Clatters ] Th-That's it, right? He's gonna be better now?
translation.ja: これで回復するの？

translation.en: That's it.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: You are insufferable. Code blue, room 519.
translation.ja: こしゃくな

translation.en: Back! Stay back!
translation.ja: 下がるんだ！

translation.en: Code blue. You have no idea how ridiculous you look right now.
translation.ja: バカな真似はやめとけ

translation.en: -Code blue. -All right. If you want to pretend this isn't happening, fine.
translation.ja: 約束を破るつもりか １人では やっていけないぞ

translation.en: But being a vampire takes skill. What is a code blue?
translation.ja: 約束を破るつもりか １人では やっていけないぞ 何の放送だ？

translation.en: Code blue. Code blue. Try not to do something stupid, like kill your family.
translation.ja: 家族を殺すことになる

translation.en: Code blue. Code blue. Room 519. Stat.
translation.ja: コードブルーです 至急 519号室へ

translation.en: You are not supposed to be in here!
translation.ja: ここに入らないで

translation.en: ♪ Trying not to let it show ♪ Well, well, well.
translation.ja: スティーブ様のお帰りか

translation.en: Steve is back, huh? So, Steve,
translation.ja: スティーブ様のお帰りか スティーブ

translation.en: whatcha... got for me?
translation.ja: 何か言うことは？

translation.en: Stay away from those brownies. They're for dessert.
translation.ja: チョコ･クッキーは食べないで

translation.en: [ Darren ] Okay. No brownies.
translation.ja: クッキーじゃない

translation.en: Hey, Darren. Do you think that this outfit looks better on her, or this?
translation.ja: ダレン この服は どっちの子に似合うかな？

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.ja: 何よ？

translation.en: You look weird.
translation.ja: 怖いわ

translation.en: Darren.
translation.ja: ダレン

translation.en: Sorry. Sorry, I...
translation.ja: ごめん ただのバンパイアごっこさ

translation.en: I was just pretending to be a vampire.
translation.ja: ただのバンパイアごっこさ

translation.en: Nice room.
translation.ja: いい部屋だ

translation.en: Some excellent reading material you have here. Thought this was all on the Internet now.
translation.ja: アダルト本とは珍しい 今どきはネットで見る

translation.en: Mine's blocked. Hmm.
translation.ja: 親がブロックを

translation.en: Don't-Don't... Don't... Don't do that. Don't cry. [ Sobbing Softly ]
translation.ja: よせ やめろ 泣くんじゃない

translation.en: Honestly. Stop, stop. No!
translation.ja: 泣くな 黙れ 泣いてないよ

translation.en: I'm not crying. Of course not. No, it's good.
translation.ja: 黙れ 泣いてないよ そうだろうとも

translation.en: Look, I don't want to hurt people, okay?
translation.ja: 人を傷つけたくない

translation.en: I'm not like you. I was this close away from killing my sister.
translation.ja: あんたとは違うのに 妹を殺しかけた

translation.en: Perhaps you should have thought of that before you stole my spider.
translation.ja: それくらい クモを盗む前に考えろ

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry, but you can't stay here. You're going to have to leave them.
translation.ja: お前は ここには住めない 家族の元から去るのだ

translation.en: Like forever?
translation.ja: 永遠に？

translation.en: Like forever.
translation.ja: 永遠にだ

translation.en: It's time to admit that to yourself, Darren.
translation.ja: 後戻りはできんぞ

translation.en: But you can't just leave. You're going to have to die first.
translation.ja: ただし去る前に お前は死なねばならん

translation.en: Hi, Mom. Hi, Dad. [ Mr. Shan ] Hmm.
translation.ja: ママ パパ

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] Hey, uh, I just wanted to say that you guys are really, really good parents.
translation.ja: 僕は本当にいい親に 育てられたよ

translation.en: You're doing a great job. And, um, I'm sorry for not doing all my chores,
translation.ja: 僕は本当にいい親に 育てられたよ ろくに手伝いもせず 文句ばかり言ってごめん

translation.en: and for complaining so much.
translation.ja: ろくに手伝いもせず 文句ばかり言ってごめん

translation.en: And, uh, I love you guys a lot.
translation.ja: そして２人とも大好きだ

translation.en: We love you too, sweetie.
translation.ja: 私たちもよ

translation.en: Bye, Annie.
translation.ja: さよなら アニー

translation.en: How old were you when you became a vampire?
translation.ja: いくつでバンパイアに？

translation.en: Twenty. It was 1803, the third of May.
translation.ja: 20歳のときだ 1803年 ５月３日

translation.en: I'd just been left by my fiancée, Hesther Collins.
translation.ja: 婚約者のへスターに去られた

translation.en: I thought she was the most beautiful girl in Baltimore.
translation.ja: ボルティモアで一番の美人だ

translation.en: I saw her again 60 years later. She was an old crone.
translation.ja: 60年後は しわくちゃだったが

translation.en: But my heart still beat like a jackrabbit.
translation.ja: 我が輩は ときめいた

translation.en: Wow. Dumped, huh?
translation.ja: フラれたわけか

translation.en: So big bad old Crepsley became a vampire 'cause he got dumped?
translation.ja: 失恋したからバンパイアに？

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] Have you ever been dumped?
translation.ja: 失恋の経験は？

translation.en: Yeah. Then perhaps you should be more sympathetic.
translation.ja: あるよ じゃあ もっと同情しろ

translation.en: Here it is.
translation.ja: これを―

translation.en: Drink up.
translation.ja: 飲み干せ

translation.en: My lips are numb. Good.
translation.ja: シビれてる いいぞ

translation.en: I've got pins and needles in my hands. Excellent.
translation.ja: 手がチクチクするよ 薬が効いてる証拠だ

translation.en: That means it's working.
translation.ja: 薬が効いてる証拠だ

translation.en: Nice night actually.
translation.ja: 星空だな

translation.en: Is that the Little Dipper or the big one? I can never remember.
translation.ja: あれは小熊座だっけ？

translation.en: Sorry about that.
translation.ja: 悪いな

translation.en: I had to do that, or they would never believe you were dead.
translation.ja: 死んだと思わせるのさ

translation.en: Don't worry. There's no damage to your spinal cord.
translation.ja: 大丈夫 脊髄(せきずい)は傷つけてない

translation.en: And I'll sneak into the funeral home and fix your broken neck.
translation.ja: あとで元に戻してやる

translation.en: Oh, and sorry about this next part.
translation.ja: 落とすのも許してくれ

translation.en: Darren.
translation.ja: ダレン

translation.en: I hate you so much for leaving me here with these idiots.
translation.ja: 俺を独りにしやがって お前を憎むぞ

translation.en: Darren. Hey, Shan!
translation.ja: ダレン おい ふざけるな 生きてんだろ！

translation.en: Asswipe, are you in there? Steve.
translation.ja: おい ふざけるな 生きてんだろ！

translation.en: Darren! Okay, time out. Time out. Not about you. We're all feeling grief.
translation.ja: よしなさい 我々も悲しいんだ

translation.en: Wakey, wakey.
translation.ja: さあ 起きて

translation.en: Here. Fill that hole.
translation.ja: 穴を埋めろ

translation.en: I can't do that. I'm all cramped up. My legs are still numb.
translation.ja: 無理だよ 脚も感覚がない

translation.en: Can you feel this? Ow! What the heck!
translation.ja: 感じるか？ ひどいな

translation.en: Do you smell a rotting corpse?
translation.ja: 死臭がしないか？

translation.en: Ha-ha. Very funny.
translation.ja: いいジョークだ

translation.en: Get back in the grave.
translation.ja: 墓穴に戻れ

translation.en: I'm not getting back in the grave. Don't argue with me.
translation.ja: やだよ ツベコベ言うな

translation.en: Get in. No.
translation.ja: ツベコベ言うな

translation.en: Hello, old friend. Old Crepsley.
translation.ja: よう 懐かしのクレプスリー

translation.en: How's the scar? Shall I give you another?
translation.ja: ほほの傷を増やそうか？

translation.en: Hello, bag of blood.
translation.ja: やあ 血の袋

translation.en: You're coming with me.
translation.ja: 俺様と来るんだ

translation.en: Run!
translation.ja: 走れ！

translation.en: You come with Murlaugh now. You're one of us.
translation.ja: 一緒に来い 俺たちは仲間だ

translation.en: Not one of those filthy vampires.
translation.ja: お前はバンパイアじゃない

translation.en: [ Muffled ] Let go of me!
translation.ja: 出してくれ！ どこへ行く？

translation.en: Hold your breath! [ Screaming, Muffled ]
translation.ja: 息を止めろ！

translation.en: Let's go! Not yet!
translation.ja: 危ない！ まだだ

translation.en: Don't look behind you.
translation.ja: 振り返るな

translation.en: Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
translation.ja: 大変だ

translation.en: Are you all right?
translation.ja: 大丈夫か？

translation.en: Come here! [ Flesh Tearing ]
translation.ja: 血を

translation.en: [ Panting ] Breathe.
translation.ja: 息を吸え

translation.en: Do you know those guys?
translation.ja: 知り合い？

translation.en: Are we there yet? Almost.
translation.ja: まだ遠いの？ もうすぐだ

translation.en: Where are we? The Cirque's winter campgrounds.
translation.ja: ここは？ “シルク”の冬季キャンプ地さ ここなら安全だ

translation.en: You'll be safe here if they let you stay.
translation.ja: “シルク”の冬季キャンプ地さ ここなら安全だ

translation.en: Try to fit in.
translation.ja: 仲よくしろ

translation.en: Come on. So all the freaks live here?
translation.ja: 来い フリークの集団？

translation.en: [ Clears Throat ] Don't stare.
translation.ja: じろじろ見るな

translation.en: Wanna go to my tent? We can rehearse in my tent.
translation.ja: 僕のテントで リハーサルしない？

translation.en: I'm not gonna rehearse in your tent.
translation.ja: あそこはイヤよ

translation.en: It'll be great, you know. You always have fun rehearsing in the tent.
translation.ja: 楽しめるぜ

translation.en: Wait here for me.
translation.ja: ここで待て

translation.en: Neutral.
translation.ja: 中立だ

translation.en: The Cirque has always remained neutral. That's how it has survived all these years.
translation.ja: シルクは中立だから 生き残ってこられた

translation.en: You'll still be neutral.
translation.ja: 中立でいろよ

translation.en: I'm not trying to drag you into anything. I'm trying to keep myself out of it.
translation.ja: 君を巻き込まずに 静かに暮らす

translation.en: And why exactly do you think Tiny wants this boy? I'm not sure yet.
translation.ja: なぜタイニーは あの少年を狙う？ 分からんが

translation.en: But whenever Mr. Tiny wants something, I make it my policy to try and keep him from it.
translation.ja: 我が輩の主義で やつの欲しがる物は渡さん

translation.en: That's a dangerous policy.
translation.ja: 危険な主義だな

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing? That's Mr. Tall's tent.
translation.ja: ミスター･トールのテントよ

translation.en: I... Hi. I'm-I'm Darren.
translation.ja: 僕はダレンだ

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.ja: 何してるの？

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] That's-That's what I'm trying to figure out.
translation.ja: 何してるか知りたくて

translation.en: You can listen if you want.
translation.ja: 君も聞くかい？

translation.en: How much does the boy know?
translation.ja: 少年に話したか？

translation.en: Nothing. He's waiting by my tent if you want to speak with him.
translation.ja: いいや 我が輩のテントで待ってる

translation.en: You know, Larten, the thing you might not realize about children is...
translation.ja: ラーテン 君には 子供が分かってないな

translation.en: they don't always do what they're told!
translation.ja: 子供は言いつけに背く！

translation.en: Rebecca. Don't you have work you should be doing?
translation.ja: レベッカ 仕事はどうした？

translation.en: Yes. Sorry, Mr. Tall. It won't happen again. I mean, I don't eavesdrop on people. It was his idea.
translation.ja: 二度と立ち聞きしないわ 彼に誘われて…

translation.en: I didn't make you do anything. Well, you couldn't make me do anything if you tried.
translation.ja: 強制してない 偉そうに言わないで

translation.en: Oh, really, huh? Enough. Rebecca.
translation.ja: よせ レベッカ 彼をエブラのテントへ

translation.en: I would like you to take Darren to Evra's tent.
translation.ja: レベッカ 彼をエブラのテントへ

translation.en: Evra will be his roommate while he stays with us.
translation.ja: ここでは エブラと同居させる

translation.en: You'll have to work, Darren. Everybody here pitches in.
translation.ja: 働くんだ ダレン みんなと協力しろ

translation.en: That's fine. I, uh...
translation.ja: 任せといて 夏休みに 父の会社でバイトした

translation.en: I actually worked for my dad's office a couple weeks this summer.
translation.ja: 夏休みに 父の会社でバイトした

translation.en: I did photocopies, so...
translation.ja: コピーを取ったり…

translation.en: This is on a temporary basis, Larten. I can't endanger everybody for your sake.
translation.ja: 長居は困るぞ みんなを危険にさらせない

translation.en: Of course. Thank you.
translation.ja: 分かってる すまん

translation.en: So, what are you doing here anyway with all these freaks?
translation.ja: 君はフリークたちと 何してる？

translation.en: Why? Do you have a problem with freaks?
translation.ja: なぜ？ フリークが嫌い？

translation.en: No, I mean, they, uh, kind of freak me out, but--
translation.ja: そうじゃなくて 何かゾクゾクする

translation.en: They freak you out. Clever. Really clever.
translation.ja: ゾクゾクする？ いい答えだわ

translation.en: Well, I really have to get back to work. Harkat can show you the way.
translation.ja: 仕事があるから ハーキャットが案内を

translation.en: Harkat, take Darren to Evra's tent, please.
translation.ja: ダレンをエブラの所へ

translation.en: Well, you better follow him.
translation.ja: 彼に ついていって

translation.en: Okay, see you sometime.
translation.ja: また会おう

translation.en: Huh! No, I saw what you did to my friend Steve's hand at the theater, buddy.
translation.ja: やだね スティーブに食いついたろ

translation.en: Dude, I'm not giving you my hand, okay?
translation.ja: 手は つながない

translation.en: I'm sorry. Here.
translation.ja: 悪かったよ

translation.en: Harkat! You have to stop biting people,
translation.ja: こら！ かみつくと 誰も近寄らなくなるわ

translation.en: or no one will want to be around you.
translation.ja: かみつくと 誰も近寄らなくなるわ

translation.en: You.
translation.ja: あなたは…

translation.en: Death.
translation.ja: 死

translation.en: Redemption.
translation.ja: 救い

translation.en: Despair.
translation.ja: 絶望

translation.en: [ Jabbering ] Triumph.
translation.ja: 勝利

translation.en: Disaster.
translation.ja: 大惨事

translation.en: What did I say?
translation.ja: 私は何と？

translation.en: "Death, redemption, despair, triumph, disaster."
translation.ja: “死 救い 絶望 勝利 大惨事”

translation.en: Well, don't worry about it.
translation.ja: 気にしないで

translation.en: Go ahead, Harkat. Take him to Evra's.
translation.ja: ハーキャット 彼を案内して

translation.en: And no more teeth.
translation.ja: かみつかずにね

translation.en: You mean, this is it?
translation.ja: このテント？

translation.en: Chill in the laundry for a sec. There you go.
translation.ja: リラックスして そうだ

translation.en: Good girl. Good snake.
translation.ja: よしよし いい子だ

translation.en: Love you.
translation.ja: 愛してる

translation.en: So, I guess we're gonna be roommates.
translation.ja: 同居人ってわけか

translation.en: So how are you f'ed up?
translation.ja: 君の特徴は？

translation.en: F'ed up?
translation.ja: 特徴？

translation.en: Freaked up. How-How... What kind of freak are you?
translation.ja: どんなフリークなんだ？

translation.en: Oh, I'm-I'm not a freak. I'm normal.
translation.ja: 僕はフリークじゃない 普通だよ

translation.en: You're normal?
translation.ja: 普通？

translation.en: No, I mean, I'm half vampire, but I'm completely normal.
translation.ja: 半バンパイアだが普通

translation.en: You're half vampire, but you're normal.
translation.ja: 半バンパイア？ でも普通

translation.en: I like that.
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: And-And don't worry about, like, if I'm gonna drink your blood or anything.
translation.ja: 心配しないで 君の血は飲まないから…

translation.en: I'm ... I'm not gonna drink anyone's blood.
translation.ja: 心配しないで 君の血は飲まないから… 誰の血もだ

translation.en: What a relief. Okay, this isn't awkward at all.
translation.ja: よかった 安心したよ

translation.en: This is your corner of the tent. All right?
translation.ja: ここが君のコーナーだ

translation.en: You do not cross over to any other part of the tent, except to enter and exit the tent.
translation.ja: 出入りするとき以外 ほかの場所に入るな

translation.en: All right? And you are never, ever to touch my stuff.
translation.ja: 出入りするとき以外 ほかの場所に入るな 俺の物には絶対 触るな 特にこれには

translation.en: Especially this stuff over here. This is my recording studio.
translation.ja: 俺の物には絶対 触るな 特にこれには 録音スタジオさ

translation.en: Oh, cool. Yeah, I... I actually used to have a drum set, but...
translation.ja: すごい 僕もドラムを持ってたけど

translation.en: [ Sighs ] You know, my-my parents made me give it away, so--
translation.ja: 親に取り上げられた

translation.en: Well, there are no parents here. [ Chuckles ]
translation.ja: ここに親はいないぞ

translation.en: Yeah. Shedding. [ Chuckles ] Itches like crazy.
translation.ja: 脱皮だよ すごくかゆい

translation.en: Uh, you should actually go wash your hand off before you get pinkeye.
translation.ja: 手を洗え 結膜炎になるぞ

translation.en: Did you forget to tell me you were gonna go away for a couple of days?
translation.ja: ２～３日で戻るって 言わなかった？

translation.en: Huh? I can't believe you're treating me like this.
translation.ja: ２～３日で戻るって 言わなかった？ 死ぬほど心配したのよ 携帯電話を持って

translation.en: I've been worried sick. Why can't you just get a cell phone?
translation.ja: 死ぬほど心配したのよ 携帯電話を持って

translation.en: Because vampires don't need cell phones. Oh!
translation.ja: 我々には必要ない

translation.en: "Vampires don't need this. Vampires don't need that."
translation.ja: “バンパイアには あれもこれも必要ない”

translation.en: I'll tell you what vampires need. They need to listen.
translation.ja: 必要なのは 人の話を聞くことよ

translation.en: Didn't I tell you that I had a foreboding? And what do you do?
translation.ja: イヤな予感がしたのに なぜ あの子をここへ？

translation.en: You show up here with that kid. It's been a long night.
translation.ja: イヤな予感がしたのに なぜ あの子をここへ？ ２つの州をフリットしてきた もう寝かせてくれ

translation.en: I just flitted across two states. I think I'll just hit the pine early.
translation.ja: ２つの州をフリットしてきた もう寝かせてくれ

translation.en: No, wait.
translation.ja: 待ってよ

translation.en: You don't love me anymore. It's my beard.
translation.ja: 愛してないのね ヒゲのせい？

translation.en: You know how I feel about you. I just don't want to outlive anyone.
translation.ja: 分かってるだろ 自分は若いままで 愛する人が老いるのはつらい

translation.en: It's depressing watching people you care about grow old while you stay young.
translation.ja: 自分は若いままで 愛する人が老いるのはつらい

translation.en: Have you looked at yourself in the mirror lately? [ Chuckles ]
translation.ja: 最近 鏡を見たことある？

translation.en: You're no kid. Oh, no, no.
translation.ja: あなた 中年よ やめて 私は怒ってるの

translation.en: I'm still angry at you. Mm-mmm. Mm-mmm. Mmm.
translation.ja: やめて 私は怒ってるの

translation.en: Your mouth says no, but your beard says yes. [ Light Thump ]
translation.ja: 口では拒んでも ヒゲが喜んでるぞ

translation.en: I can't believe he's gone, man. I know. He was like my best friend.
translation.ja: 死ぬなんて 親友だったのに

translation.en: No, he was my best friend. I knew him first.
translation.ja: 俺の親友だ 先に知り合った

translation.en: So what? I thought he was a dick.
translation.ja: 先に知り合った 彼はマヌケだ

translation.en: What? What? [ Grunts ]
translation.ja: 何だと？

translation.en: Get up before one of the teachers sees you. Get up. That kid's psycho.
translation.ja: 大丈夫か やつはイカれてる

translation.en: Mr. Leonard, whatcha got for me here? Finish the quiz already?
translation.ja: スティーブ君 どうした 問題は解けたのかね？

translation.en: - [ Mr. Tiny ] Careful. -[ Gasps ]
translation.ja: 危ないぞ

translation.en: The first step is a big one.
translation.ja: 一歩で おしまい

translation.en: Oh, I know. You miss... the one known as Darren.
translation.ja: 会いたいんだろ ダレンという少年に

translation.en: You feel betrayed, abandoned. You're a loyal friend...
translation.ja: 取り残された気分なのか 君は誠実な友達だ

translation.en: unlike him.
translation.ja: 彼とは違う

translation.en: Darren was a loyal friend.
translation.ja: ダレンも誠実だった

translation.en: Oh, really? What if I told you he's still alive?
translation.ja: そうかな？ まだ生きてるとしたら？

translation.en: He's taken your place, stealing your dreams.
translation.ja: 彼は君の夢を 横取りしたんだぞ

translation.en: Oh, I know. You dream of killing people, drinking their blood.
translation.ja: 君の夢は人を殺して その血を飲むことだ

translation.en: You dream of leading a great bloodthirsty army.
translation.ja: 血に飢えた大軍の 先頭に立ちたい

translation.en: Who the hell are you?
translation.ja: あんた 誰だ？

translation.en: I'm Mr. Tiny.
translation.ja: 私はミスター･タイニー

translation.en: Are you a vampire? I'm not a vampire.
translation.ja: バンパイア？ いいや だがバンパニーズでもない

translation.en: I'm not a Vampaneze.
translation.ja: いいや だがバンパニーズでもない

translation.en: I'm... an aficionado.
translation.ja: 私は戦争の愛好者でな

translation.en: I want to see a marvelous war.
translation.ja: すばらしい戦いが見たいのだ

translation.en: What do you want from me, you freak?
translation.ja: 僕に用か？ フリーク

translation.en: Oh, I'm not a freak. I despise freaks.
translation.ja: フリークではない 私は連中を見下しておる

translation.en: Can a freak travel back and forth between life and death? I think not.
translation.ja: やつらに生と死の間が 行き来できるか？

translation.en: Can a freak create new life from rotting flesh and dead souls? Please!
translation.ja: 腐った体と死んだ魂から 新しい命も造れまい

translation.en: Can a freak bring about the apocalypse... and rule the world?
translation.ja: 大惨事を引き起こして 全世界を支配できるか？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: 無理だ

translation.en: Sadly, neither can I... not without help.
translation.ja: だが助けがないと 私にもできない

translation.en: I need a champion.
translation.ja: 強い味方が欲しい

translation.en: One of two boys, two dear friends.
translation.ja: ２人の少年は親友で その どちらかだ

translation.en: And by the way, I love your D.N.A.
translation.ja: ところで お前の ＤＮＡが気に入ったぞ

translation.en: You care for a pancake?
translation.ja: パンケーキは？

translation.en: No, I... I can't. I'm, uh--
translation.ja: いや いらない

translation.en: We know what you are. You're bad news, that's what.
translation.ja: お前が何者か知ってる 厄介な野郎だぜ

translation.en: Huh! But nothing I couldn't deal with in just about... two bites.
translation.ja: だが この俺にかかれば ２口で食ってやる

translation.en: Don't mind him. He just needs some ex-lax. Welcome to the Cirque. [ Evra ] Yeah.
translation.ja: 便秘でイラついてるのよ 歓迎するわ

translation.en: Thank you. There he is.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Would you like to eat one of my hands? I can grow them back.
translation.ja: 手を食べる？ すぐ生えるの

translation.en: -They're very delicious. -Hey, Vampelina.
translation.ja: うまいぞ バンパイア君

translation.en: Come on. We gotta go clean out Wolfie's cage and then, uh, Crepsley left like a list of stuff for you to do for him.
translation.ja: ウルフの檻を掃除するぞ クレプスリーの雑用もある

translation.en: It looks like you're Crepsley's bitch now.
translation.ja: 彼の召し使いか？

translation.en: Evra! What?
translation.ja: 彼の召し使いか？ 何だよ？

translation.en: Okay, so you guys are gonna do it. And go.
translation.ja: きれいに片づけろ 任せたぞ

translation.en: I can't believe the Tiny People eat these rats.
translation.ja: “リトル･ピープル”が 食うのか？

translation.en: They'll eat you if you don't watch out.
translation.ja: 人も食われるわ

translation.en: [ Jabbers, Chuckles ] [ Screams ] Don't!
translation.ja: やめて

translation.en: -♪♪ [ Continues, Indistinct ] - So where do you come from anyways?
translation.ja: どこから来た？

translation.en: I guess I could probably, like, open this up, and then you'd probably turn into dust or something, huh?
translation.ja: 僕がフタを開けたら あんたは死ぬんだ

translation.en: You wouldn't like that now, would you, Dracula?
translation.ja: 怖いか？ ドラキュラ

translation.en: Who's the boss now, baby?
translation.ja: 今は僕がボスだ

translation.en: Okay. Concentrate now.
translation.ja: よし フリットに挑戦するぞ

translation.en: How hard can it be to flit?
translation.ja: フリットに挑戦するぞ

translation.en: [ Crash ] Ow! Perfect!
translation.ja: 完ぺき！

translation.en: What's the point?
translation.ja: 何がしたい？

translation.en: [ Crying ] I'm just not that much of a freak.
translation.ja: 私って三流のフリークよね

translation.en: Gertha, you're a major freak.
translation.ja: 最高のフリークさ

translation.en: Sorry. You're not my type. [ Sniffles ] ♪♪ [ Ends ]
translation.ja: あんたはタイプじゃないの

translation.en: Do you ever miss your family?
translation.ja: 家族が恋しい？

translation.en: Not really. I joined the Cirque when I was two... two days old, that is.
translation.ja: 別に ミスター･トールがゴミ箱で 生後２日の俺を見つけた

translation.en: Mr. Tall found me in a Dumpster.
translation.ja: ミスター･トールがゴミ箱で 生後２日の俺を見つけた

translation.en: So I guess this is my family.
translation.ja: 彼らが家族だ

translation.en: [ Playing Guitar ] ♪ Dumpster baby Oh, Dumpster baby ♪
translation.ja: ゴミ箱のベビー 　　ゴミ箱のベビー

translation.en: ♪ I wanna be your Dumpster baby ♪
translation.ja: ゴミ箱のベビー 　　ゴミ箱のベビー 俺を拾っておくれ

translation.en: Nah.
translation.ja: ダサい

translation.en: What are you doing? Oh, nothing.
translation.ja: 何してる？ 何も

translation.en: May I see it?
translation.ja: 見せろ

translation.en: Yeah, I guess. I've always wanted one of these.
translation.ja: いいよ 欲しかったんだ

translation.en: Hey! What are you doing?
translation.ja: 何すんだよ？

translation.en: We must be very careful who we talk to, Darren.
translation.ja: 外部の人間と話すな

translation.en: Go to your tent and stay there with Evra.
translation.ja: エブラとテントにいろ

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] Yes. I have returned.
translation.ja: そうだ 戻ってきたぞ

translation.en: I have returned! [ Cheering ]
translation.ja: この私が戻ってきた！

translation.en: Unacceptable. Unforgivable.
translation.ja: けしからん！ 許せないぞ 子供に血を注いだ？

translation.en: To blood a child? J'accuse!
translation.ja: 許せないぞ 子供に血を注いだ？ 告発するぞ！

translation.en: By the way, is he drinking enough blood?
translation.ja: 彼は血を飲んでるか？

translation.en: He's not drinking any blood.
translation.ja: 一滴も飲まない

translation.en: Not drinking blood? Crepsley, don't you know he has to? He must!
translation.ja: 飲んでない？ まずいぞ 飲ませるべきだ

translation.en: Or perhaps you're worried he'll love it too much.
translation.ja: 血のとりこになるのが 心配か？

translation.en: He might be Vampaneze at heart.
translation.ja: 本質はバンパニーズかも

translation.en: You'd like that. You've been favoring them for the last hundred years.
translation.ja: この100年間 お前は連中に味方してる

translation.en: Oh, on the contrary. I'm strictly neutral...
translation.ja: とんでもない 私は中立だぞ

translation.en: like the Cirque.
translation.ja: シルクと同じさ そうだろ ミスター･トール

translation.en: -Correct, Mr. Tall? -Correct.
translation.ja: シルクと同じさ そうだろ ミスター･トール 確かに

translation.en: Then tell us why you want him. It's one of your self-fulfilling prophecies, isn't it?
translation.ja: なぜ彼を欲しがる 予言を実現するためか？

translation.en: Well, one does dream of the cataclysm.
translation.ja: 誰でも大変革を夢に見る

translation.en: This truce may not last forever.
translation.ja: この休戦も永遠には続かん

translation.en: There might be new leaders ... new blood, as it were.
translation.ja: 新しい指導者 新しい血が現れる

translation.en: Perhaps a boy... a bloodthirsty boy.
translation.ja: たぶん少年だ 血に飢えた少年 運命は決まってるんだ

translation.en: [ Object Taps Table ] It's all been written.
translation.ja: 血に飢えた少年 運命は決まってるんだ

translation.en: Then why do you care? You're up to something, Desmond.
translation.ja: じゃあ なぜ構う？ どうも怪しい

translation.en: Me?
translation.ja: 私が？

translation.en: I may write the script, but the characters have a tendency to do as they please.
translation.ja: 筋書きを書いても 登場人物は勝手に動く

translation.en: You, for example, have an unseemly amount of free will.
translation.ja: お前も気ままに 行動してるだろ

translation.en: Now, Mr. Tall,
translation.ja: ミスター･トール

translation.en: will you be reasonable and give me the child?
translation.ja: おとなしく小僧を渡してくれ

translation.en: I've always done what you ask. I'm not one to cause trouble.
translation.ja: 面倒が嫌いだから 今まで従ってきたが

translation.en: But I need to think about all this. I won't make a decision hastily.
translation.ja: この件は考えさせろ 急いで決めたくない

translation.en: You know I always get what I want...
translation.ja: 欲しい物は手に入れる

translation.en: in the end.
translation.ja: 必ず

translation.en: [ Mr. Tiny ] Keep an eye on him, my pets.
translation.ja: 小僧から目を離すな ペットたちよ

translation.en: Hey, dude.
translation.ja: よう

translation.en: Sorry. We're on our own today. Rebecca's back in the costume shop. Oh.
translation.ja: 今日は２人だ レベッカは衣装係に戻った

translation.en: Hey. Hey.
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: Uh, I'm-I'm here for, uh, Crepsley's cape.
translation.ja: クレプスリーのマントをくれ 赤い色で…

translation.en: It's that red one with the-- I know what Crepsley's cape looks like.
translation.ja: クレプスリーのマントをくれ 赤い色で… 知ってるわよ

translation.en: Oh. What do your friends want?
translation.ja: お友達は？

translation.en: Hey! Beat it!
translation.ja: うせろ！

translation.en: Does this trailer have, like, a back entrance or something?
translation.ja: このトレーラーに裏口は？

translation.en: Yeah, uh, it's right back there. Wait, your pants are ripped.
translation.ja: あっちよ ズボンが破れてるわ はき替えて

translation.en: Take 'em off. Try... this pair on.
translation.ja: ズボンが破れてるわ はき替えて これに

translation.en: They fit. Yeah.
translation.ja: ぴったりだ

translation.en: So, um... You know, Rebecca, you...
translation.ja: ところで レベッカ 僕はまだ―

translation.en: you never really told me what you're doing here with the Cirque.
translation.ja: 君の特技を聞いてないぞ

translation.en: Well, Darren, since you ask...
translation.ja: じゃあ教えるわ

translation.en: I'm a monkey girl.
translation.ja: モンキーガールなの

translation.en: You're a what?
translation.ja: 何だって？

translation.en: What? Nothing. I...
translation.ja: 何が？ 聞き違いかな “モンキーガール”って…

translation.en: [ Laughs ] I thought you just said you were a monkey girl.
translation.ja: 聞き違いかな “モンキーガール”って…

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: そうよ

translation.en: What... What does that mean?
translation.ja: どういう意味？

translation.en: It means I have a tail. Do you have a problem with that?
translation.ja: シッポが生えてるの 何か文句でもある？

translation.en: No, because-because... 'cause you're joking, right?
translation.ja: まさか だって冗談なんだろ？

translation.en: No, I'm not joking. I keep it wrapped up because people kept stepping on it.
translation.ja: 本当よ 踏まれるから巻いてるの

translation.en: Anyway... Your pants look really good.
translation.ja: とにかく ズボン 似合ってるわ

translation.en: Yeah, I know. You... You-You... You picked it out. That's really good.
translation.ja: 君の見立てがよかった ありがとう

translation.en: [ Gasps, Squealing ] Shush!
translation.ja: 黙れ！

translation.en: Thanks. They've been spying on me all day.
translation.ja: ずっと尾行されてた

translation.en: So if-if you were interested in a girl, okay,
translation.ja: 気になる女の子がいて もしも彼女に―

translation.en: and she had, like... like, a tail, let's say,
translation.ja: 気になる女の子がいて もしも彼女に― シッポがあったら…

translation.en: would that be a problem or-- Well, I'll put it to you this way.
translation.ja: 問題だと思う？ よく聞いとけ

translation.en: If you had told me a couple hundred years ago...
translation.ja: お前が200年前に―

translation.en: that I would someday be dating a woman with bristles on her chin,
translation.ja: お前が200年前に― ヒゲ女を好きになったら 猛反対してた

translation.en: I would have told you you were insane.
translation.ja: ヒゲ女を好きになったら 猛反対してた

translation.en: But here we are.
translation.ja: 女は中身だ

translation.en: By the way, there's a new rule. You're not to leave camp anymore.
translation.ja: 新しいルールだ キャンプ地を出るな

translation.en: Why not? Because I said so.
translation.ja: なぜ？ 我が輩に従え

translation.en: You can't just tell me what to do--
translation.ja: 親父みたいなことを…

translation.en: [ Crepsley ] When was the last time you were in a fight?
translation.ja: 最後にケンカしたのは？

translation.en: Uh, second grade. Steve's usually the one that gets in all the fights.
translation.ja: 小２だ スティーブが いつも守ってくれた

translation.en: Well, Steve's not here to fight for you. And what if I wasn't either?
translation.ja: ここに彼はいない 我が輩もいなければ？

translation.en: What if you were alone in the dark and someone wanted to kill you? Rip out your heart and drink its blood?
translation.ja: お前の心臓を切り裂き 血を飲みたがる者がいたら

translation.en: What then?
translation.ja: どうする？

translation.en: Crepsley?
translation.ja: クレプスリー

translation.en: Crepsley, come on.
translation.ja: 出てきて

translation.en: Crepsley?
translation.ja: どこだ？

translation.en: [ Grunts ] You're hurting me.
translation.ja: 苦しい

translation.en: What are you going to do about it?
translation.ja: 戦わないのか？

translation.en: Well?
translation.ja: どうだ？

translation.en: You're soft. You're a soft little boy.
translation.ja: 腰抜けのガキめ やつらは お前を狙ってる

translation.en: They're looking for you, Darren. This is not the school yard.
translation.ja: 腰抜けのガキめ やつらは お前を狙ってる 遊びじゃないぞ

translation.en: You either have to learn to fight or to run. So which is it going to be?
translation.ja: 戦うか 逃げるか どちらかを学べ

translation.en: [ Grunts ] Good.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: But don't use your fist. You have something better.
translation.ja: だが拳(こぶし)より いいものが

translation.en: Use your fingernails like a dagger.
translation.ja: 爪を使え 剣のように

translation.en: Watch.
translation.ja: 見てろ

translation.en: Try it.
translation.ja: やれ

translation.en: Extend your fingers and follow all the way through. Use all your strength.
translation.ja: 指を伸ばして すべての力を込めろ

translation.en: Aah, God! I think I broke a nail.
translation.ja: 痛い！ 爪が折れたよ

translation.en: You broke a nail?
translation.ja: 爪が折れた？

translation.en: You need blood. We have a lot of work to do.
translation.ja: 血を飲め 道は険しいぞ

translation.en: -Blood will have blood. -[ All ] Blood will have blood.
translation.ja: 血が血を呼ぶ 血が血を呼ぶ

translation.en: Are you ready, you filthy little pig, to be stuck?
translation.ja: 覚悟はいいか 汚いブタめ

translation.en: Do you renounce living with the living?
translation.ja: 人間をやめて―

translation.en: Are you prepared to die... with the dead?
translation.ja: バンパニーズに なるんだな？

translation.en: Steve, what-what the hell are you doing?
translation.ja: スティーブ どうした？

translation.en: [ Laughs ] Well, hi, Mr. Kersey. Uh, I just wanted to stop by real quick...
translation.ja: どうも 先生 ちょっと謝りに寄ったんです

translation.en: and actually apologize for the way, you know, I've been acting in school lately.
translation.ja: ちょっと謝りに寄ったんです 最近 反抗的だから…

translation.en: It's 3:00 a.m.
translation.ja: 夜中の３時だ

translation.en: My teachers troubled me when I was a lad.
translation.ja: 先公には いたぶられた

translation.en: They caned me and caned me till I was bloody.
translation.ja: 血まみれになるまで 棒で叩きやがって

translation.en: Then one day, I took up a broken switch,
translation.ja: ある日 俺様は 折れた棒を奪い取って―

translation.en: and I rammed it in my teacher's eyeball.
translation.ja: 先公の目玉に突き刺した

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] Who are you?
translation.ja: 何者だ？

translation.en: I'm his mentor.
translation.ja: 彼の教育係さ

translation.en: You see, Steve?
translation.ja: 見てろ スティーブ

translation.en: This is what Crepsley wants us to live with.
translation.ja: これが クレプスリーのやり方

translation.en: So, Mr. Kersey.
translation.ja: 先生

translation.en: Whatcha got for me? [ Screams ]
translation.ja: 何か言うことは？

translation.en: So you really don't kill people?
translation.ja: 人を殺さないの？

translation.en: No, Darren.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: You just sedate them and feed a little bit, and then leave.
translation.ja: 眠らせて 血を少し頂くだけさ

translation.en: I actually developed the method.
translation.ja: 我が輩が提案した

translation.en: Well, two other vampires and I... Gavner and Vincent.
translation.ja: 賛成したのは ガブナーとビンセントだけ

translation.en: We were the freaks of the vampire world. No one understood us.
translation.ja: 最初は理解されなかったが

translation.en: And then they started to realize... that if you don't kill your prey every time like a little piggy,
translation.ja: やがて みんなも気づいてきた 人間を惨殺せねば―

translation.en: then you don't get hunted down by irate townspeople with pitchforks and torches.
translation.ja: 自分たちも 人間に追われないと

translation.en: And now half the vampires feed this way, and the other half hate us.
translation.ja: 提案に反対した連中が “バンパニーズ”と名乗ってる

translation.en: Quiet now.
translation.ja: 静かに

translation.en: Whoa. How'd you do that?
translation.ja: どうやったの？

translation.en: Vampires can exhale a gas that knocks out humans.
translation.ja: ガスを吐いて気絶させた

translation.en: Really? Drink some blood, you'll be able to do all kinds of things.
translation.ja: マジで？ 血を飲めばパワーがつく

translation.en: Now, we just make a small incision in his shoulder...
translation.ja: いいか 小さな切れ目を肩先に入れる

translation.en: right here.
translation.ja: 小さな切れ目を肩先に入れる

translation.en: And then you take a sip.
translation.ja: 血をすすれ

translation.en: Don't worry. He won't become a vampire unless you exchange blood with him.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ 彼はバンパイアにならん

translation.en: Go ahead. I had some a couple of days ago. It was very refreshing.
translation.ja: 飲め 我が輩は２日前に飲んだ

translation.en: No, I'm-I'm not gonna drink human blood.
translation.ja: 人間の血はイヤだ

translation.en: Hurry up before someone sees us. We haven't got all night.
translation.ja: 早くしないと 誰かに見つかるぞ

translation.en: I'm not going to.
translation.ja: 飲まないよ

translation.en: You have to drink blood, Darren, or you'll die. It's as simple as that.
translation.ja: 血を飲まねば お前は確実に死ぬ

translation.en: Damned kid is gonna get himself killed.
translation.ja: まるで自殺行為だ

translation.en: Larten, what made you blood him?
translation.ja: ラーテン なぜ彼に血を注いだの？

translation.en: I needed someone to run errands for me.
translation.ja: 雑用係が欲しくて

translation.en: Aw, come on. You didn't need to blood him for that.
translation.ja: そんな理由じゃないはず

translation.en: I had a feeling if I didn't, something terrible would happen to him.
translation.ja: 災難から彼を守るためだ

translation.en: Something terrible?
translation.ja: どんな災難？

translation.en: As opposed to becoming a vampire?
translation.ja: バンパイアになることが 災難よ

translation.en: I think you're getting lonely.
translation.ja: 寂しくなったの？

translation.en: After 200 years of living alone, why on earth would I suddenly become lonely?
translation.ja: 200年も独りで生きて 今さら寂しくなるか？

translation.en: I don't know. Midlife crisis?
translation.ja: さあね 中年の危機とか？

translation.en: What is it?
translation.ja: 何よ

translation.en: They're here.
translation.ja: やつらだ

translation.en: [ Rebecca ] Watch out!
translation.ja: 危ない！

translation.en: -That's not fair. -Back!
translation.ja: ずるい

translation.en: [ Rebecca ] Darren, get out of here!
translation.ja: 逃げて！

translation.en: [ Crepsley ] Duck!
translation.ja: 伏せろ！

translation.en: Move.
translation.ja: 来い

translation.en: Get in.
translation.ja: 入れ

translation.en: I don't even like the Wolf Man,
translation.ja: 俺もウルフマンは嫌いだが

translation.en: but that don't mean you can come in here and beat up on a freak!
translation.ja: ブチのめすのは許さんぞ

translation.en: You're messing with the wrong sideshow, baby! Yeah.
translation.ja: 俺が相手になるぜ！

translation.en: -I'll bite your damn noses off! -I'm gonna ram my head up your ass.
translation.ja: 鼻を食いちぎる ケツに頭を入れる

translation.en: Stop!
translation.ja: よせ！

translation.en: Stop!
translation.ja: やめろ

translation.en: There'll be no fighting here.
translation.ja: ここで戦うな

translation.en: How dare you enter this campground? The Vampire Council will hear of this.
translation.ja: よくも侵入したな バンパイア議会に報告する

translation.en: Tell the little vampire it's time to come home.
translation.ja: あのガキに家に帰れと伝えろ

translation.en: It's almost dawn. I have a spare coffin here. I suggest you get some rest as well.
translation.ja: もうじき夜明けだ お前も少し休むといい

translation.en: -Aren't we gonna double back and attack them or something? -Do you want to stay alive?
translation.ja: 戦いに戻らないの？ 生きたいだろ？ 血を飲まねば勝てないぞ

translation.en: You're not even drinking blood yet. I doubt you'd be much good in a fight.
translation.ja: 生きたいだろ？ 血を飲まねば勝てないぞ

translation.en: Well, what if they hurt someone?
translation.ja: フリークたちは？

translation.en: People can look out for themselves.
translation.ja: 自分で身を守る

translation.en: You've been looking out for me. Why?
translation.ja: なぜ あんたは 僕を守るんだ？

translation.en: Why? Because I'm an idiot, that's why.
translation.ja: それは我が輩が愚かだからさ

translation.en: Only an idiot would spit in the eye of Mr. Tiny.
translation.ja: タイニーに逆らうのは愚かだ

translation.en: Because he doesn't just kill people. He brings them back as well.
translation.ja: やつは人を殺して蘇らせる

translation.en: And when I finally die, I plan on staying dead.
translation.ja: 我が輩は死んだら 安らかに眠りたい

translation.en: Life may be meaningless, but death I still have hope for.
translation.ja: “生”は空しい 我が輩は“死”を望んどる

translation.en: Life isn't meaningless.
translation.ja: “生”は大事だ

translation.en: Tell me that after 200 years of it, kid.
translation.ja: 200年後に言えるか？

translation.en: Good day.
translation.ja: おやすみ

translation.en: They took her?
translation.ja: レベッカが―

translation.en: Where?
translation.ja: さらわれた？

translation.en: I don't know. But they said to tell you... to come home.
translation.ja: 行方は分からんが お前に“家に帰れ”とさ

translation.en: Which, of course, you're not gonna do.
translation.ja: 帰らないだろ？

translation.en: Wait, Darren, Darren. No, buddy. Those guys are huge, man.
translation.ja: 待てよ やめろ 連中は強すぎる

translation.en: Hey, Mr. and Mrs. Shan.
translation.ja: こんにちは やあ アニー

translation.en: Hey, Annie. Steve. What are you doin' here?
translation.ja: スティーブ どうした？

translation.en: Well, you know, I've been thinking. You guys probably really miss your son.
translation.ja: 考えたんですが 息子が恋しいでしょ

translation.en: And my mom is drunk half the time, so she doesn't really notice I'm there.
translation.ja: お袋は俺より 酒が大事なんです

translation.en: How about you guys adopt me?
translation.ja: 俺を養子にしませんか？

translation.en: [ Flatware Clatters On Floor ] No interest?
translation.ja: 興味なし？

translation.en: Told you they wouldn't go for it.
translation.ja: やっぱりだ

translation.en: Hmm. How disappointing.
translation.ja: がっかりだな

translation.en: So few "people" have the parenting instinct the way I do.
translation.ja: 私のほうが人間より よほど親心がある

translation.en: Ready for the prom.
translation.ja: ではパーティへ

translation.en: ♪ Make new friends but keep the old ♪ ♪ One is silver and the other's gold ♪
translation.ja: 新しい友 古い友 　　どちらも大切な宝物

translation.en: ♪ Make new friends but keep the old ♪ ♪ One is silver and the other's gold ♪
translation.ja: 新しい友 古い友 　　どちらも大切な宝物

translation.en: Hey, Octa. Say good-bye to Crepsley for me, okay?
translation.ja: クレプスリーに “さよなら”と伝えて

translation.en: Tell him I'm sorry, but I have to go home.
translation.ja: こうするしかない

translation.en: It's time, isn't it?
translation.ja: いよいよか

translation.en: Twenty-six. Uh-uh. Twenty-seven. Twenty-seven.
Twenty-seven. Hold on. Twenty-eight.
May I borrow a couple of these? Yes.
translation.ja: ２本 借りたい

translation.en: Don't forget to bring 'em back though... both of 'em.
translation.ja: ちゃんと返せよ ２本とも

translation.en: You're in danger. Terrible danger.
translation.ja: 危険が迫っている

translation.en: Your life and soul are in jeopardy.
translation.ja: あなたの命と魂が危機に

translation.en: What did I say? Nothing. Something about the weather.
translation.ja: 今 何て？ 天気のことさ 明日は雷雨か

translation.en: Chance of thunderstorms tomorrow. Don't worry. I'll stay indoors.
translation.ja: 天気のことさ 明日は雷雨か 外には出ないよ

translation.en: Applause! Applause!
translation.ja: 皆さん 拍手して！

translation.en: Look. Little vampire. [ Snarls ]
translation.ja: 来たな バンパイア小僧

translation.en: Take a bow.
translation.ja: ようこそ 家族と友人は？

translation.en: Where are my family and my friends? Please.
translation.ja: 家族と友人は？ そう あわてるな ショーが台無しになる

translation.en: Must have patience. Will spoil the show.
translation.ja: そう あわてるな ショーが台無しになる

translation.en: Do you like? Does Murlaugh have talent?
translation.ja: どうだ 俺様は才能があるか？

translation.en: No?
translation.ja: ない？

translation.en: What do you know about talent?
translation.ja: 見くびるな！

translation.en: Where is Crepsley?
translation.ja: クレプスリーは？

translation.en: [ Shouts ] Where is Crepsley?
translation.ja: クレプスリーはどこにいる？

translation.en: Bah! Too bad for "Crapsley."
translation.ja: 気の毒なやつだ

translation.en: Because he will miss the show!
translation.ja: このショーを見逃すとは！

translation.en: Here is freak...
translation.ja: あのフリークは―

translation.en: all wrapped up tight.
translation.ja: しっかり縛ってある

translation.en: -[ Muffled Grunt ] -And here are beloved family members.
translation.ja: そして愛する家族たちも

translation.en: -[ Mr. Shan ] Oh! - Applause. Applause.
translation.ja: そして愛する家族たちも 皆さん 拍手して

translation.en: Hello, beloved son. Hello, loving parents.
translation.ja: やあ 息子よ やあ パパとママ

translation.en: Hello, cute little sister.
translation.ja: やあ かわいい妹

translation.en: -Four bags of blood. - [ Mrs. Shan Whimpers ]
translation.ja: ４つの血の袋だ

translation.en: Don't worry. You're all gonna be okay.
translation.ja: みんな 大丈夫だ 大丈夫どころか―

translation.en: Will be better than okay.
translation.ja: 大丈夫どころか―

translation.en: Will be... delicious!
translation.ja: みんな うまそうだぜ

translation.en: But now may I present... reunion with oldest friend and blood brother,
translation.ja: では再会させてやろう 旧友であり 血に飢えた兄弟

translation.en: with he that shall one day rule us all...
translation.ja: 彼こそが 我らの指導者となるだろう

translation.en: the one known as Steve!
translation.ja: その名はスティーブ！

translation.en: Thank you! Thank you!
translation.ja: どうも ありがとう！

translation.en: Steve.
translation.ja: スティーブ

translation.en: You're alive?
translation.ja: 生きてたのか？

translation.en: You know, that was really an asshole thing for you to do.
translation.ja: よくも死んだふりして―

translation.en: Make your whole family and your secret best friend go through all that?
translation.ja: みんなを悲しませてくれたな

translation.en: Look, I didn't mean to hurt anybody, okay?
translation.ja: 悪気はなかった

translation.en: Who cares what you meant to do?
translation.ja: 知ったことか

translation.en: What you did was take my place. That was my dream.
translation.ja: 俺の夢を横取りしやがって

translation.en: Steve, what are you doing with him?
translation.ja: やつとの関係は？

translation.en: Who? Murlaugh? Come on, man. He's not as bad as he looks.
translation.ja: マーロックか？ 見かけほどワルじゃねえぜ

translation.en: You know, for one thing, he didn't say I had bad blood like Crepsley. And for another thing, he didn't lie to me.
translation.ja: 俺の血を けなさないし 裏切ったりもしない

translation.en: And you know what? They think I'm awesome. They say I have a destiny, or whatever.
translation.ja: 連中は俺をあがめてる 運命に選ばれた者だとさ

translation.en: Look at you. Who wants to be a vampire anyways?
translation.ja: バンパイアなんか なりたくねえ

translation.en: Vampires suck. Vampaneze rule!
translation.ja: お前らはクソ バンパニーズは最高だ！

translation.en: -Juicy! -[ Muffled Scream ]
translation.ja: うまそう

translation.en: First guy I killed... Mr. Kersey.
translation.ja: 最初に先生を殺した

translation.en: Blood just gets me going. You know what I mean?
translation.ja: 血の力はすごいぞ 分かるか？

translation.en: I wouldn't know. I haven't been drinking any.
translation.ja: さあ 僕は飲んでない

translation.en: I know you. Always trying to look like Mr. Goody Two-shoes all the time.
translation.ja: やっぱりな お前は いつもいい子ぶる

translation.en: I bet you'll, like, resist drinking blood, and resist drinking and resist drinking it.
translation.ja: そうやって我慢しても― 最後は耐えきれずに 血を求める！

translation.en: At the last second become this total bloodhound!
translation.ja: 最後は耐えきれずに 血を求める！

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] All right, man. Here's the deal. See, the fat guy, he still wants you on the team.
translation.ja: 取り引きだ タイニーは お前を求めてる

translation.en: And despite everything else, you are still my best friend.
translation.ja: だが お前は親友だから―

translation.en: So I'll tell you what. I'll make you a deal that might just save your ass.
translation.ja: 命だけは助けてやるぜ

translation.en: -If you kill your family, I'll let the freak go. -[ Grunts ]
translation.ja: 家族を殺せばフリークを放す

translation.en: Wait. My bad. That's backwards.
translation.ja: 待て 逆だった フリークを殺せば家族を放す

translation.en: If you kill the freak, I'll let your family live.
translation.ja: 逆だった フリークを殺せば家族を放す

translation.en: What? Let the juicy one go?
translation.ja: うまそうなのに？

translation.en: Hey. Look, man, it's part of the plan. - Talk to Mr. Tiny. -[ Scoffs ]
translation.ja: これも計画の一部だ タイニーに話せ

translation.en: So what do you say? Just kill her.
translation.ja: さあ どうする？ 女を殺せ

translation.en: Oh, yeah, you gotta drink her blood too. You can do her with this.
translation.ja: 血も飲むといい これで始末しろ

translation.en: [ Mr. Tiny ] Wait!
translation.ja: 待て！

translation.en: Allow him in, gentlemen.
translation.ja: 通してやれ 諸君

translation.en: I want to see this play out.
translation.ja: この結末を見たい

translation.en: [ Steve ] Mmm, man, that was pathetic.
translation.ja: 戦いにならない

translation.en: You're totally weak. You need some blood.
translation.ja: 弱すぎるぜ 血を飲め

translation.en: -Murlaugh. -Finally.
translation.ja: マーロック 来たか

translation.en: -And we thought you weren't gonna show. -[ Octa Squeaking ]
translation.ja: まさか来るとは

translation.en: -I hate spiders! -[ Squeaking ]
translation.ja: この野郎！

translation.en: Darren. Come here.
translation.ja: ダレン

translation.en: Is that your tail? Well, yeah.
translation.ja: 君のシッポ？ そうよ

translation.en: I'm really sorry I got you involved in this, okay? I-- Please stop staring.
translation.ja: 巻き込んで すまない じろじろ見ないで 血が欲しい？

translation.en: So you really need blood? Yeah.
translation.ja: じろじろ見ないで 血が欲しい？

translation.en: All right. Can you just take a little?
translation.ja: いいわ 飲んで

translation.en: Go ahead. I'm offering it to you.
translation.ja: 早く 私は平気よ

translation.en: Thanks, but I...
translation.ja: うれしいけど 失いたくないんだ

translation.en: I just can't lose it. What?
translation.ja: うれしいけど 失いたくないんだ 何を？

translation.en: Whatever's still making me human.
translation.ja: 人間でいることを

translation.en: Darren, being human is not about what you are. It's about who you are.
translation.ja: ダレン 大事なのは 人間の心を失わないことよ

translation.en: He's all yours, lad.
translation.ja: とどめを

translation.en: Good. Right in the heart.
translation.ja: いい腕だ 心臓をひと突き

translation.en: Oh, so fair and foul a day I have not seen.
translation.ja: 今日は最高で最悪の日だぜ

translation.en: My people aren't weak like yours.
translation.ja: バンパニーズは強いぞ

translation.en: They will avenge me, Crepsley.
translation.ja: 俺様のかたきを討つ

translation.en: The truce... 100 years... is over.
translation.ja: 100年続いた休戦が ついに終わるんだ

translation.en: The war begins. [ Chuckles ]
translation.ja: 戦争が始まる

translation.en: Marvelous. Magnificent!
translation.ja: すばらしい 心から楽しめたよ

translation.en: Really. Bravo.
translation.ja: 心から楽しめたよ ブラボー 最高だった

translation.en: -Bravo. -It's just like you said.
translation.ja: ブラボー 最高だった 予言どおりだ

translation.en: We started the war.
translation.ja: 戦争になる

translation.en: It won't start a war... if nobody hears about it.
translation.ja: やつの死を隠せば 戦争にはならない

translation.en: Young people today are so difficult to control.
translation.ja: 最近の若者は 私の手に負えんな

translation.en: I hate you. I hate you!
translation.ja: 裏切り者 お前こそ！

translation.en: I became a vampire to save you, Steve. Thanks!
translation.ja: 命を助けたのに

translation.en: Go ahead. Just do it!
translation.ja: やれよ 俺を殺せ！

translation.en: That's enough, boys.
translation.ja: そこまでだ

translation.en: Steve, come with me. Not before I kick his a--
translation.ja: スティーブ 私と来い まだ…

translation.en: You will behave!
translation.ja: 逆らうんじゃない！

translation.en: It's not time for you to fight... not yet.
translation.ja: お前たちが戦うのは まだ先のことだ

translation.en: Wh-What does that mean?
translation.ja: その意味は？

translation.en: Oh, it's all written down in a book. You do read books, don't you?
translation.ja: すべては本に書かれてる 本ぐらい読むだろ？

translation.en: [ Darren ] Steve.
translation.ja: スティーブ

translation.en: Look, don't... don't go.
translation.ja: よせ 行くな

translation.en: What else am I supposed to do, man? Live with you and a bunch of freaks?
translation.ja: どうしろってんだ？ フリークと暮らすのか？

translation.en: It's too late now.
translation.ja: 手遅れだ

translation.en: I have my destiny, and you have yours.
translation.ja: 俺たちの運命は違う

translation.en: How poignant. The parting of two dear friends.
translation.ja: 胸の痛む光景だな 友との別れが こんなに甘く悲しいとは

translation.en: Such sweet sorrow.
translation.ja: 友との別れが こんなに甘く悲しいとは

translation.en: Then again, you will come home to us one day,
translation.ja: だが お前は やがて我々の元に戻る

translation.en: my prodigal son.
translation.ja: 放蕩(ほうとう)息子よ

translation.en: After all, you are the bloodthirsty one.
translation.ja: 何と言っても お前は血に飢えた者だ

translation.en: No. Just because I'm a vampire doesn't mean I'm bloodthirsty.
translation.ja: いいや 僕はバンパイアだが 血に飢えてない

translation.en: It's not about what you are. It's about who you are.
translation.ja: 人間の心を持っている

translation.en: Oh. I almost forgot.
translation.ja: おお 忘れるところだった

translation.en: Cover yourself.
translation.ja: これを着ろ

translation.en: You have to teach me how to do that someday.
translation.ja: 今のやり方を教えて

translation.en: Oh, I'll teach you everything, son.
translation.ja: 何でも教えてやるぞ 息子よ

translation.en: All my gibes and gambols.
translation.ja: いいことも悪いことも

translation.en: Now, ready to go meet your people?
translation.ja: 仲間たちに会わせてやる

translation.en: Bye, Annie.
translation.ja: さよなら

translation.en: [ Darren ] Will it work? Hypnotizing them?
translation.ja: 催眠術で すべて忘れる？

translation.en: [ Snoring ] [ Crepsley ] It works on the memories,
translation.ja: 催眠術で すべて忘れる？ 記憶は消せるが 感情は残るだろう

translation.en: but not on the emotions, not really.
translation.ja: 記憶は消せるが 感情は残るだろう

translation.en: They'll always feel that you're still alive somehow.
translation.ja: お前の気配を感じるはずだ

translation.en: Well, that's good, right?
translation.ja: いいことだね

translation.en: Is it?
translation.ja: そうか？

translation.en: Hey, can I ask you something?
translation.ja: ひとつ聞くけど―

translation.en: Can I kiss you?
translation.ja: キスしていい？

translation.en: Darren, I let you drink my blood.
translation.ja: 血を飲ませたのよ

translation.en: Sure, you can kiss me.
translation.ja: もちろん いいわ

translation.en: Come on. We don't have all night. I have an injured spider here.
translation.ja: 夜が明けるぞ オクタが負傷した

translation.en: All right, how are we going to do this? I can't carry the both of you.
translation.ja: どうしよう？ ２人も背負えない

translation.en: You carry Rebecca. I can flit now.
translation.ja: 自分でフリットする

translation.en: Just like a real vampire.
translation.ja: バンパイアのように？

translation.en: Oh, Larten, you did it.
translation.ja: ラーテン 心配したのよ

translation.en: You stuck your neck out for him.
translation.ja: 血の気がうせたわ

translation.en: You'd think a vampire would know better than to stick his neck out.
translation.ja: 血のことは我が輩に任せろ

translation.en: I am proud of you.
translation.ja: 勇敢な人ね

translation.en: [ Mr. Tall ] All those who vote for making Darren a member of the Cirque,
translation.ja: ダレンを シルクの一員に迎える者は―

translation.en: raise your hands.
translation.ja: 手を上げろ

translation.en: -One hand, Evra. -Damn it.
translation.ja: 両手はダメ クソッ

translation.en: It's done. He will stay.
translation.ja: 決定だ 仲間に迎える

translation.en: So we get to stay.
translation.ja: ここで暮らせる

translation.en: Not for long, I'm afraid.
translation.ja: 長くじゃないぞ

translation.en: You know, Crepsley, it's okay.
translation.ja: いいよ クレプスリー

translation.en: It's weird. I've spent so much time wishing that...
translation.ja: ずっと後悔してた

translation.en: none of this would have happened, and that we never would have been to the Cirque in the first place.
translation.ja: シルクを観にきたのが 間違いだったと

translation.en: But now I really can't imagine my life happening any other way.
translation.ja: 今は この人生に 運命を感じる

translation.en: Dawn's coming.
translation.ja: 夜明けだ

translation.en: I had something made for you. It's in your tent. A little gift.
translation.ja: お前に贈り物がある テントの中を見てみろ

translation.en: And it's Mr. Crepsley.
translation.ja: 我が輩に敬意を

translation.en: [ Squeaking ] Because you told me to throw you. Well, I'm sorry.
translation.ja: お前が “やつに自分を投げろ”と

translation.en: You did it, man.
translation.ja: よくやった

translation.en: Once a general, always a general.
translation.ja: さすが元将軍

translation.en: I couldn't have done it better myself. At nightfall, we leave with the boy.
translation.ja: 私には真似できない 夕暮れに出発するぞ

translation.en: I suppose we should tell him.
translation.ja: 彼に話さねば

translation.en: No, let's give him one day to rest. He's earned it.
translation.ja: １日 休ませろ 彼はよくやった

translation.en: [ Darren Narrating ] Sometimes life does seem all planned out ... like there's no choice in the matter.
translation.ja: 人生は筋書きが 決まってるような気がする

translation.en: But that's an illusion. Speakers. Tasty.
translation.ja: だが錯覚だ スピーカーだ すげえ

translation.en: [ Sighs ] My name's Darren Shan.
translation.ja: 僕はダレン･シャン

translation.en: And I don't just live with a bunch of freaks. I'm one too.
translation.ja: フリークと暮らしてるが 僕もフリークだ
